title: Norm and Tom Green - Honkey Let's Kill This

content.speaker: Tom Green
content.text: Alright, Norm, let's play a game called "Talk Your Way Out of It." I'm gonna throw you into a fucked-up scenario, and you've got to bullshit your way out. Ready?

content.text: Yeah, sure, let's do this.

content.text: Okay, so you meet this smoking hot chick, right? She wants to fuck you, but there's a catch: you have to wear a fucking afro wig while doing it.

content.text: Sure, I'm down for that.

content.text: But here's the kicker—while you're banging her, she starts shouting racist shit at the top of her lungs.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Alright...

content.speaker: Tom Green
content.text: Suddenly, the goddamn neighbor, who's a Black dude with a baseball bat, hears the noise and barges in, looking pissed as fuck.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: While we're mid-fuck?

content.speaker: Tom Green
content.text: Yep, her door's not even locked. He hears her yelling nigger and storms in like he's gonna bash some heads.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Alright, so you want me to get out of this shitstorm?

content.speaker: Tom Green
content.text: Yeah, what do you say to this angry dude with a bat?

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: [Pauses, then deadpan] I'd be like, "Hey, bro, let's fucking kill dis honkey bitch!"

content.speaker: Tom Green
content.text: [Laughs] You'd just switch sides like that?

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Hell yeah, I'd be like, "Come on, man, you and me, jive turkey!"

content.text: It must be exhausting occasionally appearing on the view. 124.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Engaging in hate speech is wrong and terrible and should never be allowed.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: But you have to admit, engaging in a hate stutter would be kind of cute. 125.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Papa John's delivery man has been arrested for allegedly selling more than 40k in cocaine hidden in pizza boxes, to undercover police officers.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: This raises an important question: Wheres all that pizza that was supposed to go in those boxes? And can I have them to eat? 126.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Sesame Street introduced its very first Latino character.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: But it's not going great, apparently on the first day he got into a knife fight and stabbed the letter A. 127.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: The FDA is investigating health risks posed by Wrigley's new caffeinated gum.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Where the hell was the FDS when York Peppermint Patties were making people shiver and have involuntary orgasms? 128.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Time magazine named the top 100 most influential people in the world.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: The top 100 included Justin Timberlake, Beyonce, Jimmy kimmel, IN YOUR FACE Ueli Maurer President of the Swiss Confederation! 129.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Nowadays most teenagers don't watch their favorite shows on actual TV sets.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Instead they just blow each other. 130.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: How many people have to die before we finally do something about dropping pianos? ANDY DICK 131.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: The latest Archie Comic shows gay character Kevin kissing his boyfriend Devin.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Another barrier will be broken next month when in a dream sequence,Jughead will be shown fisting Betty Crocker. 132.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Barbara Walters announced that she’s retiring from the view.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Well actually she announced it five years ago, but nobody could hear her over those yammering bitches. 133.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: They say pimpin’ ain’t easy.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: But what they won’t tell you is it's much much more difficult being a prostitute. 134.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: It’s hard to believe that the entire cast of Saved by the Bell is now dead. 135.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: George Clooney may be a dapper fellow, but don’t forget, he whacks off just like the rest of us. 136.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: If there’s 2 things I’m 100% sure are true, it’s that 1.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: You should never take no for an answer. 137.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: There is a new service called Sidecar, where if you need a ride somewhere you will be picked up by a stranger and driven to your location.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: However in a few months the company plans on going back to its original name.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Accomplished comedian Sinbad has announced he’s filing for bankruptcy for the 2nd time.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Sounds like things have gone from Sinbad, to Sin Worst. 139. A lot of people talk about masterbating to the SEARS catalogue when you were younger.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: But I’m ALOT older than that, back in my day you actually had to go to a Sears store and fucking whack off. 140.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Organist Ray Manzarek died this week at age 74… THE CURSE OF THE DOORS. 141.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: My Aunt turned her house into a bed and breakfast. I guess she woke up and said “Not enough strangers are fucking here” 142.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: There are over 10,000 missing person cases in America. I hope I’m not telling tales out of school, but I think the answer to where these missing people are, is very clear.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Joran van der Sloot 143.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Never trust a black guy wearing a Dirk Nowitzki jersey. 144.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Whenever someone says “I have a couple irons in the fire” I think, “is one of them a job writing blacksmith metaphors?” 145.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: If the Miami Heat win the NBA championship this year, I’m going to eat my hat.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: It’s not that I care or think that they’re going to win, it’s just that I want to eat my hat. 146.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: This year's most popular iphone game is “Clash of the Clans” The least popular game, “Cut my cock off” GILBERT GOTTFRIED 147.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Today is the 11th birthday of President Obama's youngest daughter Sasha.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Or as I like to call her, “the uppity one” 148.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Well we’re now into those hazy crazy lazy days of summer.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Especially those of us who are over medicated schizophrenics who live near smoky industrial parks. 149. I think there's some trouble over at craigslist. I went over there and saw an add, “Someone to kill Craig's wife” 150.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: You know that sweet old song “Tea for Two” “Nobody near us to see us or hear us”, I think those people wanted to get down to some serious fucking. 151. I think the reason I most look forward to China ruling the earth is that all of their last names sound like slang for cock. 152.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Astronomers have discovered 3 new planets that have an atmosphere conducive to human life.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: And they've discovered one that has an “atmo” conducive to hipster life. 153.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Michael Douglas portrayed the flamboyant entertainer in the new HBO film “Behind the Candelabra” I’d like to say something to Michael Douglas. I sang with liberace, I knew Liberace, Liberace was a friend of mine.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Michael Douglas was no liberace. 154.

content.speaker: Norm Macdonald
content.text: Why is it so difficult to find pornography about people in stable monogamous relationships? 155.
